chart.name: chart.sales.per.month
chart.title: Sales per month
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.totalAmount) AS amount, MONTH(self.orderDate) AS month, _customer.fullName AS customer FROM Order self LEFT JOIN self.customer AS _customer WHERE YEAR(self.orderDate) = YEAR(current_date) GROUP BY _customer, MONTH(self.orderDate) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.sales.per.month.pie
chart.title: Sales per customer
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.totalAmount) AS amount, _customer.fullName AS customer FROM Order self LEFT JOIN self.customer AS _customer WHERE YEAR(self.orderDate) = YEAR(current_date) GROUP BY _customer

chart.name: chart.sales.by.customer
chart.title: Sales by customer
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(o.total_amount) AS amount, EXTRACT(month from o.order_date) AS month, c.full_name AS customer FROM sale_order o LEFT JOIN contact_contact c ON o.customer = c.id WHERE EXTRACT(year from o.order_date) = EXTRACT(year from current_date) AND c.id = :id GROUP BY c.full_name, month ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.sales.gauge
chart.title: Sales Gauge (this month)
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS total, MONTH(self.orderDate) AS month FROM Order self WHERE MONTH(self.orderDate) = MONTH(current_date) GROUP BY MONTH(self.orderDate)
